hotels.title: Grand Re-Opening: Adults-Only Vanuatu Beachfront Bliss with All-Inclusive Dining & Island Excursions
hotels.description: Recently reopened, this all-inclusive boutique retreat invites you to reconnect with nature by the Pacific Ocean. Home to just nine couples at a time, each traditionally designed room and villa sits on the sandy shores of Espiritu Santo - one of Vanuatu’s most spectacular islands - just steps from the archipelago's brilliant blue waters. The resort offers once-in-a-lifetime excursions included in your stay (subject to resort schedule) - become spellbound by the beauty of Santo's Blue Holes, visit the local market with the resort’s chef, kick back on Champagne Beach's postcard-worthy sands and more. Savour the flavours of the South Pacific with all-inclusive meals crafted by the talented chef using the freshest local ingredients. Between meals, glide across the shimmering waters on a kayak or paddleboard and snorkel along the magical underwater world just offshore.
